title: Backstage Pass
description: Sex and rock and roll are synonymous in Trey Taylor’s world. He lives the life of a rock star – ladies want him and men want to be him.  On stage, his bass playing skills can’t be matched. Backstage his talents are legendary.  Enjoy your backstage pass to the debauchery known as Trey Taylor, and meet his band Devil’s Lair. Warning: you may want to bring extra panties.  Backstage Pass is a short story staring bass player, Trey Taylor, of The Back-Up Series and is meant for readers who are 18+ due to mature content.
author: A.M. Madden
